title: Scorpio Form
name: Morphrost - Scorpio Form
printed_effect:
When you Cast this Morphrost you can discard
a Morphrost in order to target an opponent's
Elestral and set its base {defense} to 0 until the End
Phase. During this turn's End Phase you can
Expend {frost}{frost} in order to destroy that Elestral.
effect: When you Cast this Morphrost you can discard a Morphrost in order to target an opponent's Elestral and set its base {defense} to 0 until the next turn. During this turn's End Phase you can Expend {frost}{frost} in order to destroy that Elestral.
